title: Trifty

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Learn a player's faction at night.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- You may use your ability up to 3 times at night.
- You must always choose the same target.
- You are immune to frames.
- Your ability has a 50% chance to show your target as Town if they're not Town, or as a random evil faction that exists if they are Town.

desc:
Post 3450
*My results are always accurate! I triple check them!*
